sentence.Network_en: Switzerland isn't all cow bells and yodelling, you know.

sentence.Network_en: In yesterday's games, Switzerland beat the United States two-one.

sentence.Network_en: Two men answer-ing the description of the suspects tried to enter Switzerland.
sentence.Network_cn: 与描述的疑犯样子相符的两名男子试图进入瑞士。

Sentence.sentence: It has one of the best views in Switzerland.

sentences.en: The scenery in Switzerland is exceedingly attractive to the tourists from the whole world.
sentences.cn: 瑞士的风景对来自全世界的游客都很有吸引力。

sentences.en: The story of the bravery of William Tell and his son quickly got round,throughout Switzerland.
sentences.cn: 威廉·泰尔和他儿子的勇敢的故事很快就传遍了全瑞士。
